name: Patagonia Organic Cotton Gi Pants - Men's
description:
Make the first decision of the day a simple one, the Gi Pants are easy like sweatpants and will blend, without a ripple, into your wardrobe. Button-front elasticized waistband with an integrated belt and a gusseted crotch that allows you to hop on your bike or sprint for the train.Made of organically grown cotton canvas.2 front slanted pockets with a zippered pocket on right, and 2 rear welted pockets.Gusseted crotch allows movement.Zip fly closure with an integrated adjustable belt.Inseam is 81cm (32in.)

        Sustainability
